dct_title_s: International Travel Maps Barbados & Saint Lucia : scale 1:38,000 / 1:45,000 : Bridgetown, Castries / edited by Yusuke Ujimiya, Mark Ramsay, Tran Dinh Cuong ; Lan Joyce, editor in chief.
dct_description_sm: Panel title. At head of panel title: International Travel Maps. Relief shown by contours, gradient tints, and spot heights. Depth shown by bathymetric tints. Includes legends, indexes, text, color illustration, location map. Inset map on Barbados: Bridgetown, scale 1:8,500. Inset map on Saint Lucia: Castries, scale 1:8,500. Map shows: administrative boundaries, five classes of roads, hiking trail, coral reef, national park, tourist sites, lodging places, gas stations, lists of top attractions.
